definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Balance combines good reach in forequarters with strong drive in hindquarters.
sentences.chinese: 充分的前軀伸展和強大的後軀驅動力配合默契。

sentences.english: The hindquarter angulation balances that of the forequarters.
sentences.chinese: 後軀的角度要和前驅的角度平衡。

sentences.english: FY-chi man; do not show, and air negative natural bachi footer.
sentences.chinese: 男兒不展風雲志，空負天生八尺軀。

sentences.english: The hindquarters must be strong, muscular, and well boned, but not coarse.
sentences.chinese: 後軀必須非常強健，肌肉發達，骨量充足，但不粗糙。

sentences.english: Hindquarters should have strong propelling power. Toeing in or out is to be faulted.
sentences.chinese: 後軀驅動力強，足尖向內或向外翻屬於缺陷。

sentences.english: The hindquarters drive smoothly and with great power.
sentences.chinese: 後軀驅動力平順，而且非常強大。

sentences.english: Angulation of hindquarters should be in balance with forequarters.
sentences.chinese: 後軀角度應與前軀平衡。

definition: to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
to rouse/to invigorate/to enliven/to put sb into high spirits/con brio
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
